channel.title: Diary of a reverse-engineer - Axel "0vercl0k" Souchet & Emilien "tr4nce" Girault

item.title: Taming a wild nanomite-protected MIPS binary with symbolic execution: No Such Crackme
item.description: As last year, the French conference No Such Con returns for its second edition in Paris from the 19th of November until the 21th of November. And again, the brilliant Eloi Vanderbeken & his mates at Synacktiv put together a series of three security challenges especially for this occasion. Apparently, the â€¦
